newsitem.title: CANADA: DBRS rates TrizecHahn debentures BBB.
newsitem.headline: DBRS rates TrizecHahn debentures BBB.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service on Thursday said it assigned an initial rating of BBB with a stable trend to the C$250 million two-tranche unsecured debenture issue of TrizecHahn Corp announced yesterday.
The Toronto-based bond rating agency noted that this rating is the same as the DBRS rating on the 10.875 percent senior notes of Trizec Finance Ltd.
DBRS also confirmed the BBB rating of Trizec Finance Ltd's senior notes with a stable trend.
TrizecHahn on Wednesday said it filed with provincial regulators to sell C$250 million of unsecured debentures and said it will use the offering primarily to reduce indebtedness.
